issue.title: [Dev] Improve nightly build visibility
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13058](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13058). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We want to augment our nightly build process to include a static site that includes additional information and context about the nightly builds + failures to help developers better keep track of what needs fixing.
